name: Energyfi
description: Energyfi is designing green and cost-effective Decentralized Finance by providing a complete set of DeFi features on Avax, Near, Bsc and Echain (Energyfi Chain) all while accelerating their adoption. The Energyfi platform includes a wide range of crosschain DApps including Launchpad, Dex, Bridge, Staking/Farming and Lending features.
